DOC.brief_summary: In observational study second-generation laryngeal mask LMA Supreme Ambu AuraGain investigate .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study With Investigation Two Second Generation Laryngeal Masks
DOC.detailed_description: After approval local ethic committee , data collect prospective , non- randomise study three-month period . When contra-indications laryngeal mask use absent anaesthesiologists use either Supreme ( Teleflex Medical GmbH , Germany ) Gain ( Ambu GmbH , Germany ) . Endpoints success rate time insertion .
